column4: Help pls: During an fresh install of Edgy my ps/2 keyboard fails. Is there a boot parameter to fix this?
at what point does it fail?
you enter your it wont let you enter the username or the password?
yes, and a different keyboard also. They both work with dapper
plug/unplugging didn't fix it. They both work with dapper
i was hoping to find a boot prm
are you sure it just doesnt echo the password ? you shouldnt see anything (no ****)  when you type the password
any other keystroke fails, numlock hangs and nothing happens
you might have a dodgey port?
when i boot back to dapper, everything's allright
cehck for a bug report.. i havent heard of this before though
anyway, thanks for your help man. I'll file the bug then
